title: On The Block - 2nd Edition
description: A celebration of unposed, unfiltered, and fleeting moments that define the art of documenting everyday life. Street photography from dense urban streets to sleepy rural towns. Every corner hides unexpected beauty.
pastWinners: On The Block celebrates photographers who capture unposed moments with technical excellence and emotional authenticity. Winners typically showcase genuine human connection, strong compositional choices, and images that reveal quiet truths beneath everyday moments. The competition appreciates both experimental and traditional street photography approaches.

juryPreferences.overall: Authentic storytelling, technical mastery, emotional resonance
juryPreferences.paris_chong: Contemporary aesthetics, gallery-worthy presentation, curated quality, artistic vision
juryPreferences.arturo_soto: Conceptual depth, social commentary, experimental approaches, fine art perspective
juryPreferences.matt_stuart: Genuine candid moments, human interaction, minimal intervention, honesty, patience-driven photography

grand_prize.description: Featured interview, Online Exhibition, 16x20" print, Lucie Honoree Poster

category_winners.description: Part of Online Exhibition, 16x20" print, Lucie Honoree poster

submission_requirements.fee: $20 per image (20% discount for multiple categories)
submission_requirements.allowed_subjects: Street photography, urban landscape, candid, experimental approaches

context: Second edition of a prestigious street photography competition by Lucie Foundation (501c3 non-profit). Features exhibition and significant prizes. Jury includes respected gallery curator, fine art photographer/academic, and legendary street photographer.
